name: lf4php/lf4php
description: This is a facade for logging frameworks.

suggest.lf4php/lf4php-monolog: If you want to use Monolog
suggest.lf4php/lf4php-stdout: If you want to use Stdout
suggest.lf4php/lf4php-log4php: If you want to use log4php
suggest.lf4php/lf4php-psr3: If you want to use any PSR-3 implementation through its standard interface
